descriptionHtml:
This is my retexture of two cloaks from Volvaga0's Cloaks and Capes, it adds two new cloaks: the Dragon Slayer and the Black Snake slayer.

You need to download Volvaga's capes mod:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86219

I recommend my retexture too(i made a real leather cape):
https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88395

And finally install this retexture to replace te Yellow cape and the Purple cape (i replaced the two less used ones, the Yellow was too similar to the white one)
Enjoy and leave a comment and endorse if you liked it!!!


SLAY THE BLACK SNAKES OF SKYRIM AND WEAR THEIR SKIN!!!
https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88393

(And endorse Mihail's awesome mods!)
author: Yoshimuji-Jon
